page.title: 14Employment & Farming
page.content: These are some of the jobs that people do in Maidencombe,farm working and working in cafes and pubs.There are people working at a garage and on gardens(not many people are unemployed).Most of the people are retired.Some retired people have been in the army or have moved down from the Midlands to retire.A few were sea captains and doctors.The people living at Watcombe Heights and Petitor held important positions in different businesses. {FARMING} There is a small farm in the centre of Maidencombe.In the barn there was a plough and a harrow.Most of the fields are grass,either for the cows or to be cut later to make hay.There are also ploughed fields with crops such as barley growing in them.
